name: NostraLex
description:
Nostra Lex is a 2D platformer shooter/melee "adventure game" made out of multiple levels. In this game the main target of the player is to "teleport" to the battlefield and eliminate any enemy combatants in your way. After the player shall manage to reach the end of last level, he/she should capture the green flag at the end which will end the game successfully.

Controls: 

- A = Left

-D = Right

-Right Mouse Button = Use Lance (Attack)

-Space = Jump

Attributions:

-Gunshot Sound ("Gunshot, Distant, A.wav" by InspectorJ)
